That's true, but it would be possible to enhance the annotation in a way wh=
ere this would still work:

@Test(expected=3DMyException.class,errorCodeVal=
ue=3DmyString,errorCodeMethod=3DgetErrorCode,errorCodeType=3DString.class)
=

I think that'be sufficient for most cases. default values for method name =
and type could be set as well(most likely int).
